org.finra.datagenerator.engine

Interface Frontier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCXMLFrontier

    public interface Frontier
    Represents a partial search produced by an Engine's bootstrapping. Marshall Peters Date: 8/21/14

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void searchForScenarios(Queue<Map<String,String>> queue, AtomicBoolean flag)
      Fills the queue with Maps of variable assignments produced by a DFS strategy; the DFS is performed on a possible state bound up inside the Frontier and will stop early if flag is set to true

    • Method Detail

      • searchForScenarios

        void searchForScenarios(Queue<Map<String,String>> queue,
                      AtomicBoolean flag)
        Fills the queue with Maps of variable assignments produced by a DFS strategy; the DFS is performed on a possible state bound up inside the Frontier and will stop early if flag is set to true
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue
        flag - the exit flag
